Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/s:16eRpRemot.name: fetchTask(by:accessCode:)
Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/s:16eRpRemot.abstract: Convenience function for requesting a certain task by ID

Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/s:16eRpRemot.name: fetchAllTaskIDs(after:)
Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/s:16eRpRemot.abstract: Convenience function for requesting all task ids

Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/s:16eRpRemot.name: fetchAuditEvent(by:)
Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/s:16eRpRemot.abstract: Convenience function for requesting a certain audit event by ID

Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/s:16eRpRemot.name: redeem(order:)
Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/s:16eRpRemot.abstract: Convenience function for redeeming an ErxTask in a pharmacy

Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/s:16eRpRemot.name: communicationResources(after:)
Extensions/FHIRClient.html#/s:16eRpRemot.abstract: Requests all communication Resources for the logged in user

Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.name: allTasks(referenceDate:handler:)
Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.abstract: Request all tasks from the service in a certain format

Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.name: taskBy(id:accessCode:handler:)
Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.abstract: Request a specific task from the service in a certain format

Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.name: deleteTask(id:accessCode:handler:)
Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.abstract: Delete(/Abort) a specific task by it’s taskID and accessCode

Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.name: auditEventBy(id:handler:)
Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.abstract: Request a specific audit event from the service in a certain format

Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.name: auditEvents(referenceDate:language:handler:)
Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.abstract: Request all audit events for a specific language after a specific reference date from the service

Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.name: redeem(order:handler:)
Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.abstract: Request to redeem a ErxTaskOrder in a pharmacy

Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.name: medicationDispenses(id:handler:)
Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.abstract: Request all medication dispenses from a specific prescription

Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.name: allMedicationDispenses(referenceDate:handler:)
Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.abstract: Load all medication dispenses since reference date

Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.name: next(url:handler:)
Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html#/s:16eRp.abstract: Loads content for a given url. Used for paging.

Enums/ErxTaskFHIROperation.html.abstract: Operations we expect the FHIR service to possibly be able to perform
